response.original_title: The Story of Hubble: Man's Insatiable Quest to the Stars
response.overview: Manâ€™s Insatiable Quest to the stars ignited by Galileo in 1609 leads to the invention of the Hubble telescope that has captured the greatest cinematic drama in human history, the birth and formation of the universe transpiring over nearly 14-billion years, emanating from a source of energy so powerful that it can only be described as supernatural in nature. Based on the Book â€œHubble Reveals Creation.â€
